name: Typing Ougi Hokuto no Ken Gekiuchi
name_original: Typing Ougi Hokuto no Ken Gekiuchi
description:
Typing Ougi Hokuto no Ken Gekiuchi is an educational arcade-fighting game developed by SSI Tristar. It was originally released in 1999. SSI Tristar published the game.
Typing Ougi Hokuto no Ken Gekiuchi is available on PC.
